name: Mythopolis (Combat sequence only, not a game!)
name_original: Mythopolis (Combat sequence only, not a game!)
description:
This is a slice of a project I worked on that shows its combat sequence, to display the features I worked on in said project.

**For portfolio use as it's not a complete game!

Created in a month with my mates for a uni project, with me working on the digital implementation of the game's design, UI, programming, and enemy AI.

Made in conjunction with

Gareth - @GarethYeap on Twitter (Environment Artist)

Matthew - @bucchm on Twitter (Character Modeller (Protagonists), Animator)

Wei - @hey_iew on Twitter (Character Artist (Enemies), Character Texture Artist)

Louis - (Game Designer)
